abstract: Democratic Reps Nydia M Velazquez, Gregory W Meeks, Yvette Clarke and Patrick Murphy endorse Pres Obama's nuclear deal with Iran, giving momentum to those supporting agreement; Murphy's endorsement comes as particular surprise as he is vying for United States Senate seat in Florida growing support suggests Democrats feel opposing deal is greater political risk than supporting it.
lead_paragraph: Three members from New York and another from Florida lent fresh momentum to the pact from quarters that once appeared leery of it.

headline.main: Iran Nuclear Deal Gains Momentum With Endorsements of Four House Democrats
headline.print_headline: Iran Deal Gains Endorsements in House

snippet: Three members from New York and another from Florida lent fresh momentum to the pact from quarters that once appeared leery of it.
